citations.narrative:
On September 12, 2023 Air Serbia transported a dog in cargo on flight JU500 (AWB# 115BEG74109033) without an
active registration. Proper registration is essential in order to track the transportation of animals and to ensure compliance
with all appropriate regulations and guidelines. Carriers must register with the Secretary by completing and filing a
properly executed form. No regulated activity can be conducted until a valid registration certificate is issued by USDA
Animal Care.
This inspection was conducted with cargo facility representatives. Unable to perform an exit briefing due to inability to
reach an airline representative.
n

narrative:
2.25(a) 
   
Requirements and procedures. 
On September 12, 2023 Air Serbia transported a dog in cargo on flight JU500 (AWB# 115BEG74109033)  without an 
active registration. Proper registration is essential in order to track the transportation of animals and to ensure compliance 
with all appropriate  regulations and guidelines. Carriers must register with the Secretary by completing and filing a 
properly executed form. No regulated activity can be conducted until a valid registration certificate is issued by USDA 
Animal Care. 
 
This inspection was conducted with cargo facility representatives. Unable to perform an exit briefing due to inability to 
reach an airline representative. 
 
 n
